easyStandard.skull: -1 (-3 instead if you are at an _Extradimensional_ location).
easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another chaos token. If you fail, discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck.
easyStandard.tablet: -2. If you fail and Nahab is at your location, she attacks you.
easyStandard.elderThing: -3. If you fail, resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.

hardExpert.skull: -2 (-4 instead if you are at an _Extradimensional_ location).
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another chaos token. If you fail, discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck.
hardExpert.tablet: -3. If you fail and Nahab is in play, she attacks you (regardless of her current location).
hardExpert.elderThing: -4. Resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.
